body_html:
I'm getting this error trying to run this:

Top-level exception: Cannot colocate nodes 'modelAverage_nesterov313/cond_627/read/Switch_modelAverage_nesterov313_0' and 'modelAverage_g313: Cannot merge devices with incompatible jobs: '/job:ps/task:1' and '/job:worker'
	 [[Node: modelAverage_nesterov313/cond_627/read/Switch_modelAverage_nesterov313_0 = Switch[T=DT_FLOAT, _class=["loc:@modelAverage_g313"], _device="/job:worker"](modelAverage_nesterov313/cond/Merge, cond_627/pred_id)]]
Caused by op u'modelAverage_nesterov313/cond_627/read/Switch_modelAverage_nesterov313_0'

This is with merge_devices set to either True or False.

body:
I'm getting this error trying to run this:

```
Top-level exception: Cannot colocate nodes 'modelAverage_nesterov313/cond_627/read/Switch_modelAverage_nesterov313_0' and 'modelAverage_g313: Cannot merge devices with incompatible jobs: '/job:ps/task:1' and '/job:worker'
	 [[Node: modelAverage_nesterov313/cond_627/read/Switch_modelAverage_nesterov313_0 = Switch[T=DT_FLOAT, _class=["loc:@modelAverage_g313"], _device="/job:worker"](modelAverage_nesterov313/cond/Merge, cond_627/pred_id)]]
Caused by op u'modelAverage_nesterov313/cond_627/read/Switch_modelAverage_nesterov313_0'
```

This is with merge_devices set to either True or False.
